languages.text: "Сержант, сумевший произвести впечатление на столь благородную особу, будет представлен к награде".
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."
languages.original_text: "Сержант, сумевший произвести впечатление на столь благородную особу, будет представлен к награде".

traits.locale_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for a decoration."
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for a decoration."
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."
"The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

languages.text: "Der Sergeant, dem es gelungen ist, eine Person von so hohem Stand zu beeindrucken, wird für eine Auszeichnung nominiert."
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: "Der Sergeant, dem es gelungen ist, eine Person von so hohem Stand zu beeindrucken, wird für eine Auszeichnung nominiert."

languages.text: « Le sergent qui a su impressionner une sommité telle que vous sera recommandé pour une distinction. »
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: « Le sergent qui a su impressionner une sommité telle que vous sera recommandé pour une distinction. »

languages.text: “这位军士竟能给您这样尊贵的人留下如此深刻的印象，他会得到勋章的。”
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: “这位军士竟能给您这样尊贵的人留下如此深刻的印象，他会得到勋章的。”

languages.text: 「あなたのような高貴な地位のお方を感動させた軍曹は、叙勲に推薦されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような高貴な地位のお方を感動させた軍曹は、叙勲に推薦されるだろう」

languages.text: «El sargento que logró impresionar a una persona de tan noble posición será recomendado para condecoración».
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: «El sargento que logró impresionar a una persona de tan noble posición será recomendado para condecoración».

languages.text: "Böylesine soylu bir mevkideki birini etkilemeyi başarmışsa o çavuşa nişan verilmesini salık vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "The sergeant who managed to impress a person of such noble standing will be recommended for decoration."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesine soylu bir mevkideki birini etkilemeyi başarmışsa o çavuşa nişan verilmesini salık vereceğim."
